慜字的基本解释

慜
mín
聪明敏捷：“彼欲知我知之，人谓我慜。”
古同“愍”：“郁结纡轸兮，离慜而长鞠。”

慜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǐn］
［《廣韻》眉殞切，上軫，明。］
(1)聪敏。
(2)同“愍”。忧伤。
(3)同“愍”。哀怜。
(4)同“愍”。祸难。

慜字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慜； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页399第02
【廣韻】眉殞切【集韻】美隕切，?音敏。【廣韻】聰也。◎按正字通溷愍閔，誤。

慜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
慜字的起名意思

聪敏。

慜
Basic explanation of words
慜
mín
Smart and agile: "If he wants to know what I know, people call me 慜."
Gu Tong "stunned": "Slumped and stunned, and stunned in a long bow."
慜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mǐn］
["Guang Yun" eyebrows are cut, Shang Zhen, Ming. ]
(1) Smart.
(2) Same as "stunned". sad.
(3) Same as "stunned". pity.
(4) Same as "stunned". Misfortune.
慜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　慜; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 399 02
[Guang Yun] Eyebrows are cut off [Ji Yun] Beautifully cut, sound sensitive. [Guang Yun] Cong Ye. ◎According to the straight character, the word is passed, and it is wrong.
慜

慜
Name meaning
Smart.
mǐn
Imǐn
聪明敏捷的 bright and nimble
彼欲知我知之, 人谓我慜。 --《管子》
IImǐn
同"愍"。 哀怜 have pity on sb.。 如: 慜念(哀怜, 怜念); 慜顾(怜悯顾惜)
